product_name: Seattle Sports Sherpak GoGate Truck Tailgate Cover
long_description: The Seattle Sports Sherpak GoGate Truck Tailgate cover is a protective pad that can be used to secure your boat, surfboard or bike in the back of your truck. Pad covers half of the tailgate, and it helps protect your truck's paint as well as your gear. Multiple daisy-chain lash points let you securely cinch down the Seattle Sports Sherpak GoGate Truck Tailgate cover. Zippered pocket features a tethered red safety flag that can be mounted to the end of your boat, or other long items.
short_description: The Seattle Sports Sherpak GoGate Truck Tailgate cover is a protective pad that can be used to secure your boat, surfboard or bike in the back of your truck.
